title: RansomEye Playbook Step
description: Frozen schema for playbook steps. All fields are mandatory. No optional fields allowed. Declarative only, no scripting.

step_id.description: Unique identifier for this step (UUID v4)

step_type.description: Type of playbook step (frozen enum, no custom types)

step_order.description: Order of step execution (0-based, sequential only)

parameters.description: Step-specific parameters (declarative only, no variables or scripting)
